subject: Lacrosse
Deaths (Obituaries)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Will Barrow, a co-captain of Virginia’s 2008 team, was found dead in his off-campus apartment. He died Saturday, but the university’s sports media relations office did not release a cause of death. Barrow starred on the team that reached the semifinals of the N.C.A.A. tournament. Barrow, who was still in Charlottesville working on his degree, was the 11th player selected in the Major League Lacrosse draft.
